data.name: Skeeter's Grid
data.detailed_description:
Chill out on Skeeter’s Grid…

Re-connect mixed-up circuits in this 80s-inspired isometric puzzler as you move from board to board, each of increasing complexity and variation. Collect components, remnants of former grid guardians, as you rebuild each system, with the chance of additional components spawning during replays.

Notable Features:

  • Randomly shuffled boards with statistics recorded for every variation.
  • Bonus achievements for using every circuit on the board. Or just speed-run through if that's your preference. It's up to you.
  • Original ambient soundtrack subtly evolves as Skeet moves from board to board. Put on some headphones and chill.
  • Gather up the components you'll need to rebuild the other guardians and secure the grid.

Note that although keyboard is fully supported, Skeeter's Grid is built for gamepads with Steamdeck as the intended launch platform.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
